Protocols/TextEditorViewPasteObserver.ht.name: acceptableTypeIdentifiers

Protocols/TextEditorViewPasteObserver.ht.name: transformItemProvider(_:completion:)
Protocols/TextEditorViewPasteObserver.ht.abstract: The text editor view asks the observer to transform accepted pasting and dropping item.

Protocols/TextEditorViewPasteObserverTra.name: transformed()
Protocols/TextEditorViewPasteObserverTra.abstract: The paste observer has completed transforming the pasting or dropping item and no other transforms are needed.

Protocols/TextEditorViewPasteObserverTra.name: transformed(to:)
Protocols/TextEditorViewPasteObserverTra.abstract: The paste observer has completed transforming the pasting or dropping item to the string

Protocols/TextEditorViewPasteObserverTra.name: noTransform()
Protocols/TextEditorViewPasteObserverTra.abstract: The paste observer has not transformed and the other transforms are needed.

Protocols/TextEditorViewEditingDelegate..abstract: A callback when the text editor view did end editing.
